title: Allison Janney wins Best Supporting Actress Oscar for I, Tonya

meta_data.author: Shannon Liao
meta_data.description: Allison Janney just took home an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress in I, Tonya. Janney played Tonya Harding’s mom in the film.

og.description: Allison Janney just took home an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress in I, Tonya. Janney played Tonya Harding’s mom in the film.
og.title: Allison Janney wins Best Supporting Actress Oscar for I, Tonya
